name: Awaken The Time
description:
"Awaken The Time is a post-apocalyptic adventure game that follows the journey of the last surviving god as they travel through different lifetimes. The game is told in five chapters, each set in a distinct time period and featuring a unique gameplay style."


3 GamePlay styles and 5 Acts:

Act 1(Past)

In the game's first act, players take on the role of a samurai who can use a variety of combat techniques, including melee, archery, and magic.

Act 2

You go into the garage and you’ll find a companion from the maze. And he will throw you in the future.
Act 3


In this post-apocalyptic game, players take on the role of a survivor fighting against hordes of zombies and other survivors in a desolate world.

Act 4

As you progress through the game, you discover a suit that allows you to manipulate time, and you use it to locate a captive entity.
Act 5


As the game progresses, you are betrayed by your AI companion and another entity who wants to trap you because they are unable to kill you.
